name: Pond Ecosystem Sim - Keep It Alive
name_original: Pond Ecosystem Sim - Keep It Alive
description:
Keep It Alive! In this case "IT" is a simple pond ecosystem.

Use a variety of sliders to influence a simple POND ecosystem simulation.

Features:

  • Ecosystem Simulation - Fish and their food are generated semi-randomly and interact with each other 
  • Fish Needs - Youth, Health, Hunger, Old Age, Mating, and Death is simulated for each fish!
  • Genealogy - Fish inherit a blend of colors from their parents!
  • Sliders - Control many aspects of the pond ecosystem keep IT alive or create a fish hell.
  • CPU Melter - Turn up the sliders and see what happens!

Controls - WASD to Move camera - hold right mouse to rotate camera.
